items.sentence: I know I'm supposed to enjoy this class, but I don't.
It would be almost impossible to do that by yourself.
When he was a baby, Tom often cried himself to sleep.
Tom and I've been playing in the same band for years.
It's a pity that you can't come to my birthday party.
Instead of going to Boston, you should go to Chicago.
I wish that you hadn't made the decision on your own.
I don't think that you love me as much as I love you.
How long do you think that it'll take you to do that?
That's exactly what my father used to always tell me.
